name: Elphie's Asteroid Destruction Simulator
description:
You are Elphie.  Space Beagle.  Pilot.  Good Girl.  

You are adrift on a long journey.  In order to keep your skills keen and honed, you fire up your Asteroid Destruction Simulator (tm).  Using your wily aeronautic prowess, you must destroy all of the asteroids, squeak toys, and dreaded space chickens.

Make sure you are using your Energy Carrot Shields to avoid trouble and detonate the all-mighty Power Bomb when hope seems lost! 

IMPORTANT INFO:

Elphie's Asteroid Destruction Simulator plays in a 1280x1280 static window and is currently only available for the Windows platform.

We are looking to release on MacOSX, Linux, and possibly HTML5 in the future, so stay tuned!
